question_text: All things considered, how satisfied are you with your life as a whole nowadays? Please note that 0 means 'not at all satisfied' and 10 means 'completely satisfied' and 5 means about average.
Do you have a partner at the moment?

Can you please categorise the net income of your household in the past month, meaning the income of all members of your household after taxes and contributions to social insurance are deducted? This refers to the sum resulting from wages, salary, income from self-employment, retirement or pensions. Please also add income from public assistance, income from renting and leasing, assets, housing allowance, child benefits and other income. If you are self-employed: Please estimate your monthly profit after taxes.
Do you have internet at home? This can be a connection via a landline, cable or mobile internet, for example via a smart phone.
What best describes your current situation? If more than one category fits, select the option that best describes your situation.

code_domain.4: Helping family member in a business or family farm
code_domain.8: Taking care of the home or family
code_domain.10: On parental leave or childcare leave
code_domain.11: Ill or disabled for a long time or permanently

question_text: Thinking about the measures policymakers in Germany have taken to fight the Corona virus since the beginning of the pandemic: Have policymakers in Germany done too much, just enough, or too little to fight the Corona virus?
A household may have different sources of income and more than one household member may contribute to it. Thinking of your household's total monthly income, is your household able to make ends meet?
How satisfied are you with your relationship with your partner? Please note that 0 means 'not at all satisfied', 10 means 'completely satisfied', and 5 means 'about average'.
How did you and your partner meet?

code_domain.3: Through a hobby, an association, or sport
code_domain.4: At a bar, nightclub, or dance club
code_domain.9: Through social networks, chatrooms, or similar platforms online

question_text: Has this partnership already existed for at least three months?
At what type of college or institution did you earn this degree (or the highest of these degrees)?

code_domain.3: University of applied sciences, engineering school, or other non-university higher education facility
code_domain.4: University (scientific university, also art school, pedagogical university, theological university)

question_text: On a typical day, how many hours do you spend using the internet? Please give the total amount of time you use the internet on a computer, tablet, mobile phone, or another device, whether for work-related or private use, either at home or on the go.
